Class Monster

  • java.lang.Object
    • DungeonCharacter
      • Monster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Gremlin, Ogre, Skeleton

    public abstract class Monster
extends DungeonCharacter
    Abstract Monster class that is used to create different monster types.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Monster

        public Monster(java.lang.String name,
               int hitPoints,
               int attackSpeed,
               double chanceToHit,
               double chanceToHeal,
               int damageMin,
               int damageMax,
               int minHeal,
               int maxHeal)
        Full constructor for a Monster object
        Parameters:
        name - the monster name
        hitPoints - the number of hit points the monster has
        attackSpeed - the monster's attack speed
        chanceToHit - the monster's chance to land a hit
        damageMin - the monster's minimum damage
        damageMax - the monster's maximum damage
        chanceToHeal - the monster's chance to heal
        minHeal - the monster's minimum heal amount
        maxHeal - the monster's maximum heal amount

    • Method Detail

      • heal

        public void heal()
        This method checks conditions for if the monster heals. If successful, heath is added.

      • subtractHitPoints

        public void subtractHitPoints(int hitPoints)
        Subtract hitpoints from the monster, then attempts a heal
        Overrides:
        subtractHitPoints in class DungeonCharacter
        Parameters:
        hitPoints - the number of hitpoints to subtract
